Summary For insights into BigData -Follow me at @connect_arnab 
 
 A Senior Enterprise Architect presently associated with Wipro Consulting with a strong consulting and presales background possessing 14 years of experience in Big Data, Analytics ,Cloud and Enterprise applications.  
 Strong experience of leading multiple Big Data and Data transformation implementations in Banking and Financial Services, High Tech and Utilities industries.  
 Lead Presales Architect with a keen eye for Big Data sales and integration opportunities at various price points in multiple industry verticals. 
 Capable of translating customer requirements into Mapreduce paradigms and then using machine learning algorithms to derive effective intelligence from the data lakes. Significant experience in Hadoop Security and production support.  
 Sized and designed scalable Big Data landscapes with central Hadoop processing platforms and associated technologies like ETL tools and NoSQL databases on both Cloud and On-Prem hardware.  
 Possesses strong hands on experience in Cloudera Hadoop , HortonWorks Hadoop , Cassandra , ETL tools , Amazon Web Services Big Data tools and Microsoft Azure 
 
 
 
 
Pre-Sales & Client engagement  
⇨ Relied on architecture skills, hands on understanding of technology and extensive knowledge in the North American consulting industry to drive multiple consulting orals with architecture and technical responses to client RFP’s . 
⇨ Continually provided account specific value added services mostly at CXO level client executives and has successfully been a key influencer in client buying behavior, particularly in the framework of existing client projects Summary For insights into BigData -Follow me at @connect_arnab

 A Senior Enterprise Architect presently associated with Wipro Consulting with a strong consulting and presales background possessing 14 years of experience in Big Data, Analytics ,Cloud and Enterprise applications.  
 Strong experience of leading multiple Big Data and Data transformation implementations in Banking and Financial Services, High Tech and Utilities industries.

Pre-Sales & Client engagement  
⇨ Relied on architecture skills, hands on understanding of technology and extensive knowledge in the North American consulting industry to drive multiple consulting orals with architecture and technical responses to client RFP’s . 
⇨ Continually provided account specific value added services mostly at CXO level client executives and has successfully been a key influencer in client buying behavior, particularly in the framework of existing client projects Experience Big Data Solution Architect Microsoft August 2015  – Present (1 month) Bengaluru Area, India Group Architect - Big Data Wipro Consulting June 2014  –  August 2015  (1 year 3 months) Bengaluru Area, India • In customer facing role , conduct technology strategy/architecture workshops independently and make presentations to CXO/Board level audience on Big Data architecture and transformation possibilities leading to conversion in sales opportunities. 
• Key Architect driving Big Data sales pitches, RFP responses, pre-sales activities and providing Big Data architecture support to sales teams. 
• Customer development engagements translating customer requirements into Java or Python based data processing programs.  
• Integrated the Hadoop platform with various open source technologies like Flume, Sqoop, Hive, Pig and Apache Spark to enable data consumption and analytics 
• Enabled multiple Big Data use cases for customers ranging from Security as a service to Customer sentiment analysis 
• Designed Big Data landscapes with Hortonworks Hadoop stack, Flume, Jasper charts to enable analytics models for security and instruction detection for a Swiss Customer. 
• Architected Big Data clusters on the cloud to ingest and write data from and to Amazon S3 storage and Redshift to keep cost of data storage to a minimum.  
• Enabled cloud watch and Ganglia on large AWS based cloud clusters to enable effective monitoring of clusters. 
• Built mid to large clusters on AWS cloud using multiple instances of the Amazon EC2 cloud. This was to enable use cases which used distributions of Cloudera Hadoop or Hortonworks Hadoop.  
• Conceptualized, architected multiple Big Data landscapes on AWS EC2 for Water Utilities industries in UK enabling the businesses of these companies compete better in areas in cost optimization, maintenance predictability and customer sentiment analysis.  
• Architected AWS based Cloudera Hadoop cluster for an insurance and financial services customer in Australia. The effort also included migrating data from Teradata into Linux Staging Server into Cloudera Cluster and exposing the data for further analysis using Qlick View and R. Wipro Senior Architect - Hadoop AMP June 2014  –  January 2015  (8 months) Sydney Area, Australia Senior Hadoop Architect involved in setting up Hadoop Clusters on the AWS cloud ecosystem 
Hadoop production support and maintenance 
Hadoop Security design and architecture 
Hadoop integration with Big Data landscape and troubleshooting problems

• Lead Architect responsible for full stack architecture design( Hardware,Software) and integration of Enterprise applications with open source Big Data appliances.  
• Engaged with analytics and data processing vendors conducting proof of concepts to induct best fit technologies for the IT enterprise landscape. 
• Independently enabled the SaaS strategy to design and build systems migrating data analytics functionalities on the cloud. 
• Authored data processing algorithms in Python and Java.
